Posts.Content: Jun 10, 2012 05:58AM Snomis1 wrote: Google can be a great source of information.  It can also be difficult to navigate due to the large quantity of junk and commercial interests.  When doing a google search for medical information, a suggestion to limit the seach to medically relevant research data is to use the site "google.com/scholar".  Starting here will help you find medically relevant data much quicker.   Good Luck
